title: Regarding OCE skin
body:
I'm not sure if this has been suggested, but why not have multiple skins that are given as a choice and then depending on what one the player wants, they choose that one and that's it. This way the whole of OCE doesn't have to be rounded up into the entirety of one skin. For example, there could be a NZ skin and an AUS skin that players from AUS will choose their respective skin and players from NZ will choose their respective skin.

I think this could solve a lot of the problems and make it easier. While some people will miss out on getting the other OCE skins due to the one they pick, that's a risk that I'm sure Riot is going to have to take seeing as it's hard to make an entire skin for OCE itself. I don't think it would matter too much people missing out as there's skins for other regions that people won't ever get due to not playing on it. While the skin itself isn't a big problem, I think this will help finally solve the dilemma.
